footer.aboutText: Your ultimate destination for free online games. Play the best games across multiple categories!

worldGuesser.title: World Guesser
worldGuesser.subtitle: Play World Guesser Online
worldGuesser.description: Test your knowledge and travel the world virtually with World Guesser. Play now and discover new countries, pinpoint random streets, and have fun!
worldGuesser.gameDescription: Test your knowledge and travel the world virtually with World Guesser. Use landmarks, road signs, architectural styles and other clues to determine the location.
worldGuesser.controlsText: Use mouse to select location on map, scroll wheel to zoom map.

monsterSurvivors.title: Monster Survivors
monsterSurvivors.subtitle: Play Monster Survivors Online
monsterSurvivors.description: Survive endless waves of monsters, upgrade your character, unlock powerful skills!
monsterSurvivors.gameDescription: Monster Survivors is a challenging survival game. You need to survive against endless waves of monsters, upgrade your character by collecting experience points, and unlock new skills and weapons. The game features roguelike elements, making each playthrough unique.
monsterSurvivors.controlsText: Use WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse click to attack enemies.

crazyShooters.title: Crazy Shooters
crazyShooters.subtitle: Play Crazy Shooters Online
crazyShooters.description: Crazy shooting game, eliminate all enemies, become the strongest shooter!
crazyShooters.gameDescription: Crazy Shooters is a fast-paced shooting game. You need quick reflexes and accurate shooting to eliminate all enemies. The game includes various weapons and items, and you can obtain more powerful equipment through upgrades.
crazyShooters.controlsText: Use mouse to aim and shoot, WASD to move character.

stickmanGtaCity.title: Stickman GTA City
stickmanGtaCity.subtitle: Play Stickman GTA City Online
stickmanGtaCity.description: Freely explore the city in stickman style, complete various missions!
stickmanGtaCity.gameDescription: Stickman GTA City is an open-world game. You can freely explore the city, drive various vehicles, and complete various missions. The game features stickman style with simple and fun graphics.
stickmanGtaCity.controlsText: Use WASD to move, spacebar to jump, E key to enter vehicles.

rainbowSurvival.title: Rainbow Survival
rainbowSurvival.subtitle: Play Rainbow Survival Online
rainbowSurvival.description: Survive in the rainbow world, collect rainbow energy, unlock special abilities!
rainbowSurvival.gameDescription: Rainbow Survival is a colorful survival game. You need to survive in a world full of rainbows, collecting rainbow energy to unlock special abilities. The game features beautiful graphics and fun gameplay.
rainbowSurvival.controlsText: Use WASD to move, collect rainbow energy.

pixelSurvival.title: Pixel Survival
pixelSurvival.subtitle: Play Pixel Survival Online
pixelSurvival.description: Pixel-style survival game, adventure in a retro world!
pixelSurvival.gameDescription: Pixel Survival is a retro pixel-style survival game. You need to collect resources, build shelters, and fight enemies in the pixel world. The game features classic pixel art style.
pixelSurvival.controlsText: Use WASD to move, mouse click to collect and build.

tankArena.title: Tank Arena
tankArena.subtitle: Play Tank Arena Online
tankArena.description: Drive tanks in the arena, engage in fierce battles with other players!
tankArena.gameDescription: Tank Arena is a multiplayer online tank battle game. You need to drive tanks in the arena and engage in fierce battles with other players. The game includes various tank types and weapon systems.
tankArena.controlsText: Use WASD to move tank, mouse to aim and shoot.

crazyCattle3d.title: Crazy Cattle 3D
crazyCattle3d.subtitle: Play Crazy Cattle 3D Online
crazyCattle3d.description: 3D crazy cattle game, control the herd to complete various challenges!
crazyCattle3d.gameDescription: Crazy Cattle 3D is a 3D physics game. You need to control a herd of crazy cattle to complete various challenges and missions. The game features 3D graphics with realistic physics effects.
crazyCattle3d.controlsText: Use WASD to control herd movement, spacebar to jump.

tankWarSimulator.title: Tank War Simulator
tankWarSimulator.subtitle: Play Tank War Simulator Online
tankWarSimulator.description: Realistic tank war simulation, experience intense battlefield combat!
tankWarSimulator.gameDescription: Tank War Simulator is a realistic tank war simulation game. You need to drive tanks on the battlefield and engage in intense battles with enemies. The game simulates realistic war environments.
tankWarSimulator.controlsText: Use WASD to move tank, mouse to aim and shoot.

fiveNightsAtFreddys4.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
fiveNightsAtFreddys4.subtitle: Play Five Nights at Freddy's 4 Online
fiveNightsAtFreddys4.description: Horror survival game, survive five nights in the darkness!
fiveNightsAtFreddys4.gameDescription: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 is a horror survival game. You need to survive five nights in the darkness, avoiding terrifying animatronics. The game features a horror atmosphere and requires strategic thinking.
fiveNightsAtFreddys4.controlsText: Use mouse to click surveillance cameras, close doors and lights.

warOfTanksPaperNote.title: War of Tanks Paper Note
warOfTanksPaperNote.subtitle: Play War of Tanks Paper Note Online
warOfTanksPaperNote.description: Paper-style tank war game with unique artistic style!
warOfTanksPaperNote.gameDescription: War of Tanks Paper Note is a paper-style tank war game. The game features a unique paper art style with simple and fun graphics. You need to drive paper tanks in battle.
warOfTanksPaperNote.controlsText: Use WASD to move tank, mouse to aim and shoot.

squadShooter.title: Squad Shooter
squadShooter.subtitle: Play Squad Shooter Online
squadShooter.description: Squad shooting game, cooperate with teammates to eliminate enemies!
squadShooter.gameDescription: Squad Shooter is a team-based shooting game. You need to cooperate with teammates, develop tactics, and eliminate enemies. The game emphasizes teamwork and tactical coordination.
squadShooter.controlsText: Use WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, coordinate with teammates.

fiveNightsAtFreddys3.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
fiveNightsAtFreddys3.subtitle: Play Five Nights at Freddy's 3 Online
fiveNightsAtFreddys3.description: Classic horror game, survive in an abandoned pizzeria!
fiveNightsAtFreddys3.gameDescription: Five Nights at Freddy's 3 is a classic horror game. You need to survive in an abandoned pizzeria, avoiding terrifying animatronics. The game features a tense and exciting atmosphere.
fiveNightsAtFreddys3.controlsText: Use mouse to click surveillance cameras, manage power systems.

stickFighter3d.title: Stick Fighter 3D
stickFighter3d.subtitle: Play Stick Fighter 3D Online
stickFighter3d.description: 3D stickman fighting game, showcase your fighting skills!
stickFighter3d.gameDescription: Stick Fighter 3D is a 3D fighting game. You can control stickmen in 3D environments to fight, using various fighting techniques to defeat opponents.
stickFighter3d.controlsText: Use WASD to move, mouse click to attack, key combinations for special skills.

kingdomBattle3d.title: Kingdom Battle 3D
kingdomBattle3d.subtitle: Play Kingdom Battle 3D Online
kingdomBattle3d.description: 3D kingdom war game, build your kingdom, conquer the world!
kingdomBattle3d.gameDescription: Kingdom Battle 3D is a 3D strategy war game. You need to build your own kingdom, train armies, and conquer other kingdoms. The game features 3D graphics with strong strategic elements.
kingdomBattle3d.controlsText: Use mouse to click for building and management, WASD to move camera.

warstrike.title: Warstrike
warstrike.subtitle: Play Warstrike Online
warstrike.description: Intense war shooting game, eliminate all enemies!
warstrike.gameDescription: Warstrike is an intense war shooting game. You need to eliminate all enemies on the battlefield and complete various missions. The game features fast-paced action and intense combat.
warstrike.controlsText: Use WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

maskedSpecialForces.title: Masked Special Forces
maskedSpecialForces.subtitle: Play Masked Special Forces Online
maskedSpecialForces.description: Special forces shooting game, execute secret missions!
maskedSpecialForces.gameDescription: Masked Special Forces is a special forces shooting game. You need to execute various secret missions, eliminate enemies, and complete mission objectives. The game emphasizes tactics and strategy.
maskedSpecialForces.controlsText: Use WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, develop tactics.

stickmanParkour.title: Stickman Parkour
stickmanParkour.subtitle: Play Stickman Parkour Online
stickmanParkour.description: Stickman parkour game, showcase your parkour skills!
stickmanParkour.gameDescription: Stickman Parkour is a parkour game. You control stickmen to perform parkour through various obstacles, showcasing your skills and reflexes.
stickmanParkour.controlsText: Use WASD to move, spacebar to jump, Shift to accelerate.

run3d.title: Run 3D
run3d.subtitle: Play Run 3D Online
run3d.description: 3D parkour adventure game, run in space!
run3d.gameDescription: Run 3D is a 3D parkour game. You need to run in 3D space, avoid obstacles, and collect energy. The game features 3D graphics with unique perspectives.
run3d.controlsText: Use WASD to move, spacebar to jump, collect energy.

burnoutCity.title: Burnout City
burnoutCity.subtitle: Play Burnout City Online
burnoutCity.description: City street extreme drifting, experience speed and passion!
burnoutCity.gameDescription: Burnout City is a racing drift game. You need to perform extreme drifting on city streets, experiencing speed and passion. The game features beautiful graphics and smooth controls.
burnoutCity.controlsText: Use WASD to control vehicle, spacebar for handbrake drift.

funPartyMakeup.title: Fun Party Makeup - Party Makeup Game
funPartyMakeup.subtitle: Play Fun Party Makeup Online
funPartyMakeup.description: Create perfect party makeup looks and showcase your makeup skills!
funPartyMakeup.gameDescription: In Fun Party Makeup, you play as a professional makeup artist, creating perfect looks for girls attending parties. The game offers a rich variety of cosmetics and tools, including foundation, eyeshadow, blush, lipstick, mascara, and more.
funPartyMakeup.controlsText: Use mouse to select cosmetics, left click to use, drag to apply.
